prod_short_desc: Drive in the heavy driller and start digging the cave!
prod_long_desc:
Grab your hard hat and head out with the LEGO® City Mining Heavy Driller to make new discoveries! This fun toy features a functioning heavy driller with minifigure cab, shovel loader with tipping bed, plus a mine cave with breakaway golden nugget elements and a mobile lab. Includes 3 minifigures and a glow-in-the-dark spider figure.
Includes 3 minifigures: 2 miners and a geologist, plus a spider figure.
Features a functioning heavy driller with minifigure cab and a shovel loader with tipping bed.
Also includes a mine cave with breakaway golden nugget elements, mobile lab and a buildable tool stand.
Spider glows in the dark!
Turn the knob on the back of the heavy driller to spin the drill bit.
Shovel the golden nuggets into the loader bed, then tip the bed to empty the nuggets by the lab.
Set a golden nugget in the lab machine to analyze it.
Accessory elements include 8 golden nugget elements, a mug and a buildable stand with dynamite element and shovel.
This fun toy is suitable for ages 5-12.
Heavy driller measures over 2” high, 9” long and 3” wide.
Shovel loader measures over 1” high, 4” long and 1” wide.
Mine cave measures over 3” high, 4” wide and 2” long.
Mobile lab measures over 1” high, 2” wide and under 1” long.
